about_the_game:
Immortalis is a roguelike game that focus on the exhausting side of Dracula's immortality.

Whenever the player dies, he returns to the depths of the underworld and needs to cross over to the world of the living.

Each time the player manages to cross over, they will be able to find a different scenario, depending on where their executors "buried" their body. The underworld changes too.

Take revenge on your executioners, conquer your castle, terrorize humans. Make your choices.

Is Immortality a blessing or a burden? Time to find out.


  • Map with procedural generation
